## Libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Analysis

```{r}
m <- read.table(sep=',', quote='', header=T, '~/tmp.csv')
mvsim <- m[m$dir == 'various_simulators',]
```

```{r}
ggplot(mvsim %>% filter(sample == 'sample0.05'), aes(x=param, y=rca)) + geom_boxplot(aes(linetype=training, color=mapq, fill=target)) + scale_y_continuous(limits=c(-15, 15))
```
